snippet: Swedish Finance Minister Anders Borg will propose a number of tax rises in the government's spring budget to strengthen public finances and provide more money for education, he said in a radio interview on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Swedish Finance Minister Says Tax Hikes Needed to Boost Finances
headline.main: Swedish Finance Minister Says Tax Hikes Needed to Boost Finances

lead_paragraph: Swedish Finance Minister Anders Borg will propose a number of tax rises in the government's spring budget to strengthen public finances and provide more money for education, he said in a radio interview on Saturday.
